fields.description:
Description:
1.Build the KS specifically for BB (got it from Russ) to the BB simulator.
2.Go to controls tab. 
3.Tap on textarea table view row.

Actual Result:
1.Nothing happens after tapping on the textarea table view row.

Expected Result:
1.We should be able to launch the textarea test.
fields.summary: Blackberry : KS : Clicking on textarea in controls tab does not do open anything.
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201212191959
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130114171802
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
Win 8 
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386
